dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Rescued Time​</line-height>
dataList.desc: Have 1000 [LimitedTime] at the start of the Encounter

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Accelerated Regeneration​</line-height>
dataList.desc: Turn End: If a Part is broken, spend 100 Time from that Part to recover from Part Broken state next turn.

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Everyone's Time​</line-height>
dataList.desc: At 75% HP, enter the second phase. Upon phase change, recover SP up to 30, and divide the [LimitedTime] between all Parts as [OwnTime].
